eng: I'd like to know how much time I have left to study
darija_ar: بغيت نعرف شحال بقا ليا تلوقت باش نقرا
transl: I wanted to know how much time I have left to study.

eng: and since when have sleeping helped anyone?!
darija_ar: أُ منيمتا بسّالاما النعاس كان كايعاون شي واهد?!
transl: I was peacefully asleep, why was someone disturbing me?!

eng: Beets are good, but it might give you a sweet taste.
darija_ar: لباربا زوينا, والاكين تقدر تعطيك واحد لماداق حلو
transl: She's very kind, and she can give you a delicious homemade dish

eng: Unless you have anything else you would like to add
darija_ar: ماعادا ألا عندك شي حاجة خرا بغيتي تزيدها
transl: You don't have anything else you want to add except for some crap

eng: which happens to many people theses days
darija_ar: هادشي تايوقع ل عاداد من الناس هاد ليامات
transl: This happens to a lot of people these days.

eng: the pressure has indeed affected your general emotional state
darija_ar: الضاغط بلفيعل ءتّر علا لحالا لعاطيفيا لعامّا ديالك
transl: The pressure actually reveals your true feelings.

eng: Maybe she is constantly worried about not meeting her targets.
darija_ar: إمكن هيا ديما خايفا ماتحقّقش ل أهداف ديالها.
transl: She might always be afraid of not achieving her goals.

eng: Do you have colleagues who feel stressed like you?
darija_ar: واش الناس اللي خدّامين معاك تايحسّو بتّاوتّور بحالك?
transl: Do the people working with you feel the same way as you do?

eng: I work a lot, which allows me to do my job properly.
darija_ar: تانخدم بزّاف, داكشي اللي تايخلّيني ندير خدمتي مزيان.
transl: I work a lot, that's what allows me to do my job well.

eng: Tell me, are you able to do your work with confidence?
darija_ar: ڭولّيا, واش نتا قادّ تدير خدمتك بكولّ تيقا?
transl: Tell me, can you provide your service with full trust?

eng: Have you had any unusual or unpleasant experiences recently?
darija_ar: واش دوّزتي شي تاجاريب ماعاديّاش أُلّا فشكل موءخاران?
transl: Have you experienced any adventures lately, or are you still stuck in your comfort zone?

eng: But there are so many options to choose from.
darija_ar: والاكين راه كاينين عرّام تلختيارات اللي تختار منّهوم.
transl: And the choices you make are the ones that define you.

eng: I've really struggled to understand what it is I have to do
darija_ar: وا تكرفصت بلمعقول باش نفهم أش خسّني ندير
transl: I tried my best to make sense of what I should do.

eng: I don't know the location of all the ingredients yet
darija_ar: أنا ماعارفش لبلاسا ديال ڭاع لماقادير حتّال دابا
transl: I don't know the location of that store, it might have closed down by now.

eng: Now isn't the time for such questions
darija_ar: دابا ماشي لوقت ديال بحال هاد ل أسإلا
transl: Now is not the time for such questions.

eng: I don't want to scare you but I think we may be about to plummet to our death
darija_ar: مابغيتش خلعكوم والاكين تايبالّيا حنا إمكن غاديين اللهاويا
transl: I don't want to break up with you, maybe we are meant to be together.

eng: But by the way, I don't know how to provoke her magical powers
darija_ar: بلموناسابا, أنا ڭاع ماكانعرف نجبد لقيوا السيحريا ديالها
transl: In Monastir, I used to not know how to swim until I discovered its magic.

eng: It's stupid to loose when we have a good card!
darija_ar: جات مكلّخا أنّاك تخسر أُنتا عندك كارطا زوينا!
transl: She came to tell you that you will lose, you have a good hand!

eng: You know, I really liked today's lecture
darija_ar: عرفتي شنو, أُلّاه أسيدي إلا عجبني الدرس تليوما
transl: You know what, I didn't understand anything, except that I liked today's lesson.

eng: You seem to have had difficulty with the equations
darija_ar: كايبان بحالّا كان عندك موشكيل معا ل أسإلا
transl: It seems like you had a problem with the internet connection.

eng: Then sit down quickly and we will look at your homework
darija_ar: إوا ڭلس بزّربا أُ غانشوفو ليك التامارين ديالك
transl: Now, be careful because they will see through your lies.

eng: Being late was unavoidable, so just play the music
darija_ar: ماكانش مومكين نتفاداو التعطال, إدان هي تلق لموسيقا
transl: We couldn't avoid the traffic jam, as there was a music festival.

eng: How about we say that tomorrow we go on an excursion
darija_ar: أش بالّيك نڭولو ڭاع غدّا نمشيو لشي تفجيجا
transl: What do you say we go to a concert tomorrow?

eng: I thought I asked you to speak to your mom?
darija_ar: أنا فراسي ڭلت ليك تهدر معا لواليدا ديالك?
transl: I feel like you should talk to your parents.

eng: Well, we're gonna have to wait for someone to repair it
darija_ar: إوا راه غيخسّنا نتسنّاو شي حدّ باش إصاوبو
transl: Now they will think we are waiting for someone to fix it.

eng: I can't wait to find out what's behind this wall
darija_ar: كانتسنّا هير إمتا نعرف أش مورا هاد لحيط
transl: We were waiting here until we knew what was behind this wall.

eng: Well, indeed, this big red button looks good
darija_ar: موهيم, فيعلان, هاد لبوتون لحمر لكبير كايبان زوين
transl: Don't worry, this red button looks good and big.

eng: The ringing stopped, and I don't think anyone's gonna answer us.
darija_ar: كايصوني حتّا وڭف, أُ ماتانضنّش شي واهد غايجاوبنا.
transl: He pretends to listen, but he doesn't understand anything and will answer us.

eng: When I look at a green pepper, it becomes a red pepper
darija_ar: فاش كانشوف ف فلفلا خدرا, كاتولّي فلفلا حمرا
transl: When I see a green pepper, it tells me it's a red pepper.

eng: Can you please explain what you mean by 'normal'?
darija_ar: واخا تشرح ليا عافاك أش كاتعني ب 'عادي'?
transl: And if you explain to me please, what does 'عادي' mean?

eng: But these colors can last several hours
darija_ar: والاكين هاد اللوان كايبقاو واهد لعاداد ديال السوايع
transl: These colors will remain vibrant for a long time.

eng: Except maybe my great grandfather, but he drank a lot
darija_ar: ماعادا إمكن البات جدّي, والاكين كان كايشرب بزّاف
transl: It's no longer possible to joke around, as he used to drink a lot.

eng: Good morning Mr Hamid, how are you feeling this morning?
darija_ar: صباح النور السي هاميد, أش كاتعاود هاد الصباح?
transl: Good morning, Mr. Hamid, how are you feeling this morning?

eng: If you're going to a party, I wouldn't advise you to cook
darija_ar: ألا كنتي غادي لشي حفلا, ماكانّصحكش ت طيّب
transl: If you were going to a party, you shouldn't have gotten ready.

eng: Yes, I think i mentioned to you that I played a lot of soccer
darija_ar: أه, كانضنّ ڭلت ليك أنّاني كانلعب بزّاف كورا
transl: Oh, I thought you knew that I used to play a lot of football.

eng: It's been a long time since we've had to hit the road, I feel like we're lost
darija_ar: مودّا هادي مادربنا الطريق, كانحسّ بحال ألا توضّرنا
transl: This mood hasn't shown us the way, I feel like we're lost.

eng: And that may be very difficult to realize
darija_ar: أُ هادشي إقدر إكون صعيب تردّ ليه لبال
transl: This can be difficult to respond to.

eng: I would like to play sport but I don't seem to have any energy
darija_ar: ماكرهتش نلعب سپورت والاكين بحالا كانحسّ ماعنديش الطاقا
transl: I didn't hate playing sports, but lately I feel like I don't have the energy.

eng: Not all of your answers were entirely relevant
darija_ar: ماشي ڭاع ل أجويبا ديالك عندها عالاقا بلمووضوع
transl: It's not necessary to answer her about the matter.

eng: He always gets better grades than I do, even if he writes anything.
darija_ar: ديما كايجيب حسن منّي, واخا ماكايكتب التا زفتا.
transl: He always takes advantage of me, but he never writes unless it's bad.

eng: But she must be 20 years older than you.
darija_ar: والاكين راه غاتكون كبيرا عليك بشي عشرين عام.
transl: Otherwise, it will be a big deal for you for twenty years.

eng: No, it's the first time in my life I've played this game!
darija_ar: اللا, هادي أوّل مرّا فحياتي تانلعب هاد اللوعبا!
transl: No, this is the first time in my life playing this game!

eng: Unfortunately he stank of body odor all day!!
darija_ar: ليلأساف كانت عاطيا منّو ريحت لعرڭ النهار كامل!!
transl: Last night, she was giving off a scent that lasted the whole day!

eng: It's nice, this park, when it looks good like that
darija_ar: مزيانا هاد جريدا فاش تاتكون زوينا بحال هاكا
transl: This newspaper is good when it is nice like this.

eng: We should walk around more often, it feels good
darija_ar: خسّنا نبداو نجيبو دويرا مرّا مرّا, كاتحسّ برّاحا
transl: We should start getting groceries little by little, I feel like we're running out.

eng: Why is there rice in the cupboard if we never serve it?
darija_ar: علاش كاين الروز فل پلاكار ألا ماعمّرنا خدّمناه?
transl: Why is there a rose in the plate that we have never used?

eng: It's okay, it's just that I don't want to do anything
darija_ar: ماشي موشكيل, راه هير مابغيت ندير تا حاجة
transl: No problem, he's just not interested in doing anything.

eng: I know you looked at my cards when I was away.
darija_ar: فراسي شفتي ليا لكارطا ديالي فاش كنت خارج.
transl: I realized I left my ID card at home when I was already outside.

eng: You're still nice, I like you even though you're a cheater!
darija_ar: راك باقي ضريف, نتا عزيز عليا واخا كاتغوش!
transl: You're still cute, you're dear to me even when you're annoying!

eng: But it's your birthday, we'll do whatever you want
darija_ar: والاكين هادا راه عيد ميلادك, غانديرو اللي عجبك
transl: And if this is your birthday gift, they will do what you like.

eng: For the music, I've prepared a playlist that I think you're going to love
darija_ar: بنيسبا اللموسيقا, ڭادّيت واهد ليستا لي كانضنّ غاتعجبكوم
transl: In terms of music taste, I have found a playlist that I think you will like.

eng: Uh... actually, I have a problem, boss...
darija_ar: وه... صاراحا, عندي واهد لموشكيل أ شف ...
transl: Well... this morning, I have a gift for you that I bought...

eng: Yes, it's not too good right now...
darija_ar: وايه, ل أُمور ماشي عالا مايورام هاد الساعا...
transl: Yeah, some things are not going well at the moment...

eng: my dog is sick, plus I have roaches in my apartment!
darija_ar: لكلب ديالي مريض, زيد عليها عندي بوجعران فلپارتما!
transl: My dog is sick, I also have a headache in the apartment!

eng: But, you know, sugar isn't very good for dogs.
darija_ar: والاكين, راك عارف, السكار راه مامزيانش بزاف اللكلاب.
transl: And you know, the drunkard is not much better than the dogs.

eng: Oh, can I get a piece of meat instead?
darija_ar: أُه, واش إمكن ناخود طرف ت اللحم فبلاصتها?
transl: Oh, can we take a piece of meat from its place?

eng: Sorry sent message by mistake - complete garbage!
darija_ar: السموحات سيفتّ ميساج بل غالاط - هي زبل!
transl: Sorry, this message is full of mistakes - it's rubbish!

eng: Yeah, I was thinking about the alarm button.
darija_ar: وايه, راه كنت تانفكّر فل بوتون ديال لالارم.
transl: Yeah, I was thinking about the alarm button.

eng: I never want to see you in my business again.
darija_ar: ماباقيش بغيت نشوفك ف شاريكا ديالي مرّا خرا.
transl: I don't want to see you in my life ever again.

eng: if you want me out of here, you're going to have to fire me.
darija_ar: ألا بغيتيني نخرج من هنا, خسّك تجرّي عليا.
transl: If you want me to leave here, make sure you pay me.

eng: I'll leave my lunch until I'm really hungry.
darija_ar: غانخلّي لغدا ديالي حتّا نكون فيا الجوع نيت.
transl: I will save my tomorrow even if hunger is my companion tonight.

eng: I was about to leave the restorant when my friends arrived
darija_ar: كنت غادي نخرج من رستورا فاش جاو لعشران
transl: I was about to leave the restaurant when they arrived late.

eng: I have three children, two girls and one boy
darija_ar: عندي تلاتا ت الدراري, جوج بنات أُ ولد
transl: I have three siblings, two girls and one boy.

eng: Do you know how to scream very loud, or sing very loud?
darija_ar: واش كاتعرف كيفاش تغووت بجّهد, ولا تغنّي بجّهد
transl: Do you know how to swim with effort, or do you sing with effort?

eng: Do you have any other ideas that come to mind?
darija_ar: واش عندك شي أفكار خرين جاوك ف راسك?
transl: Do you have any other ideas that came to your mind?

eng: We could just sit here and wait for somebody to find us.
darija_ar: نقدرو نڭولسو هنا أُ نتسناو شي واحد يلقانا
transl: We can chat here until we find someone.

eng: I prefer ducks, I think that swans can be mean.
darija_ar: أنا كانفضّل لبط, لوز شي مرّات كايكون قبيح
transl: I used to prefer duck, but sometimes it can be ugly.

eng: have you ever flown in a plane before?
darija_ar: واش عمرك ركبتي ف شي طييارا من قبل?
transl: Have you ever been on a plane before?

eng: It's poetic what you say, but it's not very positive!
darija_ar: هادشي شاعيري لي كاتڭول, والاكين راه ماشي إجابي!
transl: This is just poetry that I say, and those who understand it are not many!

eng: Statistically, accidents usually happen at takeoff or landing.
darija_ar: إحصاإان, لكسايد كايتراو عاداتان فل إقلاع أُ لهوبوط.
transl: In aviation, pilots follow specific procedures for takeoff and landing.

eng: I'm going to talk to someone who actually cares.
darija_ar: غادي نهضر معا شي واحد لي مصووق بلمعقول
transl: I will talk to someone who is trustworthy and reasonable.

eng: You'll be enjoying the weather in a few weeks.
darija_ar: غادي تمتعي بل جوو من دابا شي سيمانات.
transl: You will enjoy the weather in a few weeks.

eng: And what do you think is my favourite subject?
darija_ar: أُ أشناهووا لماوضوع اللي عزيز عليا ف ناضارك?
transl: They understood the importance of the topic that is dear to me in our discussion.

eng: And I hope you still play the guitar!
darija_ar: أُ كانتمنّا أنّاك تكون مازال كاتلعب ل ڭويتار!
transl: We hoped you would still be playing the guitar!

eng: Well, it doesn't have to be too bad.
darija_ar: لموهيم, ماخاصش يكون هادشي خايب تال هاد داراجا.
transl: Don't worry, this won't be a problem until this moment.

eng: Yeah, that's what I remember about food.
darija_ar: أيه, هادشي لي بقيت عاقل عليه علا لماكلا.
transl: Yeah, this is what I've been insisting on all along.

eng: I hope the retirement home is about various activities.
darija_ar: كانتمنّا أنّا هاد دار لعاجازا فيها أنسهيطا موختاليفا.
transl: We hoped that this house would be a place for relaxation and tranquility.

eng: They arrange a mini-bus which takes us somewhere interesting.
darija_ar: كايجيبو لينا ميني-بوس كايدّينا ل شي بلاسّا مزيانا.
transl: They bring us a mini-bus that takes us to a nice place.

eng: Poor thing, spending her life in the middle of old, frustrated and old.
darija_ar: مسيكينا, دووز حياتها وسط الشورّاف, محرومين أُ شرّاف.
transl: Poor thing, she spends her life among the wealthy, deprived of dignity.

eng: But we really don't have much money these days.
darija_ar: والاكين راه ماعندناش بزّاف ديال لفلوسّ هاد لييامات.
transl: The problem is we don't have a lot of money these days.

eng: I'm a sensitive and fragile character, just like my little dog.
darija_ar: عندي شخصييا مورهافا أُ هشيشا, بحال لكلييب ديالي.
transl: Personally, I have a friend who is as fragile as glass.

eng: Do you have any other special recipes here?
darija_ar: واش عندكوم شي وصفات خاصّين وحدين خرين هنا?
transl: Do you have any unique and special recipes here?

eng: And my son Jilali still helps out as much as he can
darija_ar: أُ ولدي الجيلالي مازال كايعاونّي ب جهدو كامل
transl: My son Jalal is still helping me with his full effort.

eng: Of course, I still have my head, you know!
darija_ar: ب طابيعت لحال, راني مازال شاد ف راسّي!
transl: By nature, I am still stubborn!

eng: But it must take him some time, to take care of you.
darija_ar: والاكين أيكون كايدي ليه لوقت بزّاف, باش يقابلك.
transl: Sometimes he pretends to be busy for a long time just to avoid meeting you.

eng: Or should I say that you make them make!
darija_ar: ولا خاصني نڭول اللي كاتفرض عليهوم يصايبو ليك!
transl: I won't let anyone force me to do what benefits them!

eng: It's been 15 minutes since I've seen her, I miss her!
darija_ar: شي 15 ل داقيقا هادي باش شفتها, توحشتها!
transl: I haven't seen her for 15 minutes, I miss her!

eng: I always thought there would be more time
darija_ar: ديما كنت كانڭول راه غادي يكون لوقت كتر
transl: I always knew that it would take more time.

eng: I always thought the idea of growing old together sounded romantic
darija_ar: ديما كانت كاتجيني لفيكرا ديال نشرفو بجوج رومانسيا
transl: She always used to come to me with romantic movie ideas.

eng: I don't have many friends except Rachid...
darija_ar: ماعنديش بزّاف ديال ل أصديقاء من غير راشيد...
transl: I don't have many friends without Rashid.

eng: Ok ok... then you can do the guest list.
darija_ar: واخا واخا... دير نتا ڭاع اللاإحا ديال لمعروضين.
transl: Do whatever you want, you're the master of your own decisions.

eng: But only if she doesn't bring her dog with her.
darija_ar: والاكين غير إلا ماكانتش أتجيب معاها لكلب ديالها.
transl: And the truth is, she only brought her dog with her.

eng: I always bring several with me just in case.
darija_ar: ديما كانجيب معايا بزّاف ماعرفتي لوقت أشنو تجيب.
transl: You always bring up a lot with me, I never know what you're going to bring up next.

eng: And I've decided to go all by myself to get away from it all.
darija_ar: أُ قرّرت نمشي بوحدي باش نبعّد علا كولشي.
transl: I decided to go alone to get away from everything.

eng: You'll see, it's very nice once we're up here.
darija_ar: هانتا غادي تشوف, لمنضر زوين فاش غادي نطلعو.
transl: You will see, when the view is nice, we will go out.

eng: I've never liked heights, and we're going to be very high up!
darija_ar: ماعمرني عجبني لعلو, أُ غادي نطلعو لفوق بزّاف!
transl: I never liked heights, but I'm going to go up a lot!

eng: The clouds, from above, it's like a sea of cotton.
darija_ar: سحاب, من لفوق, بحال شي بحر ديال لقطن.
transl: Clouds, from above, like a sea of cotton.

eng: They'll be stopping by with the soda soon.
darija_ar: غادي يجيو أُ يجيبو لموناضا من دابا شويا.
transl: They will come to bring the furniture in a little while.

eng: What's the code for your credit card?
darija_ar: أشناهووا ل كود ديال لا كارت بانكاير ديالك?
transl: What is the code for your bank card?

eng: You can never trust people in confined spaces!
darija_ar: مايمكنش ليك التيق ف الناسّ فل بلايسّ لمسدودين!
transl: You can't trust people in tight places!
